title: Let's translate!
text: 帮助 MUI 将文档翻译成中文. 🇨🇳
You can follow us on Twitter to receive exclusive tips and updates about MUI and the React ecosystem.

title: 📄 Our docs just got a major upgrade!
text: Each of MUI's products now has its own dedicated documentation, making it easier than ever to find exactly what you need. Check out the blog post for more details.

title: Premium passengers, please proceed to the boarding gate 🚀
text: Check out our blog post introducing the MUI X Premium plan, and the new licensing model.

title: Get a first look at Joy UI 🚀
text: Joy UI is MUI's new starting point for your design system. Check out the blog post to see what's in store for this new library.
